About Me

I am an IT specialist with over a decade of diverse experience in the IT industry, including international work experience. I mainly specialize in computer and software systems, security and privacy. I am known for excellent organizational skills and prompt troubleshooting. . My key areas of expertise include Linux and unexpected talent for cooking curry.
